options.description: DID resolution options that will be passed to the method specific resolver. See: https://w3c.github.io/did-spec-registries/#did-resolution-input-metadata See: https://www.w3.org/TR/did-core/#did-resolution-options

resolveDid.description: Resolves DID and returns DID Document

meta.description: Optional. Key metadata. This should be used to determine which algorithms are supported.

kid.description: Key ID to use for encryption

meta.description: Optional. Key metadata. This should be used to determine which algorithms are supported.

secretKeyRef.description: The secret key handle (`kid`) as returned by  {@link  IKeyManager.keyManagerCreate | keyManagerCreate }

publicKey.description: The public key of the other party. The `type` of key MUST be compatible with the type referenced by `secretKeyRef`

keyRef.description: The key handle, as returned during `keyManagerCreateKey`

algorithm.description:
The algorithm to use for signing. This must be one of the algorithms supported by the KMS for this key type.

The algorithm used here should match one of the names listed in `IKey.meta.algorithms`

encoding.description: If the data is a "string" then you can specify which encoding is used. Default is "utf-8"

keyManagerCreate.description: Creates and returns a new key

keyManagerSharedSecret.description: Compute a shared secret with the public key of another party.

keyManagerSign.description: Generates a signature according to the algorithm specified.

meta.description: Optional. Key metadata. This should be used to determine which algorithms are supported.

alias.description: Optional. Identifier alias. Can be used to reference an object in an external system
Optional. Identifier alias. Can be used to reference an object in an external system
Identifier alias. Can be used to reference an object in an external system

didManagerAddKey.description: Adds a key to a DID Document

didManagerAddService.description: Adds a service to a DID Document

didManagerCreate.description: Creates and returns a new identifier

didManagerFind.description: Returns a list of managed identifiers

didManagerGetByAlias.description: Returns a specific identifier by alias

didManagerGetOrCreate.description: Returns an existing identifier or creates a new one for a specific alias

didManagerGetProviders.description: Returns a list of available identifier providers

didManagerRemoveKey.description: Removes a key from a DID Document

didManagerRemoveService.description: Removes a service from a DID Document

replyTo.description: Optional. List of DIDs to reply to

replyUrl.description: Optional. URL to post a reply message to

credentials.description: Optional. Array of attached verifiable credentials

presentations.description: Optional. Array of attached verifiable presentations

dataStoreGetMessage.description: Gets message from the data store

dataStoreGetVerifiableCredential.description: Gets verifiable credential from the data store

dataStoreGetVerifiablePresentation.description: Gets verifiable presentation from the data store

dataStoreSaveMessage.description: Saves message to the data store

dataStoreSaveVerifiableCredential.description: Saves verifiable credential to the data store

dataStoreSaveVerifiablePresentation.description: Saves verifiable presentation to the data store

save.description: Optional. If set to `true`, the message will be saved using  {@link  IDataStore.dataStoreSaveMessage | dataStoreSaveMessage }

replyTo.description: Optional. List of DIDs to reply to

replyUrl.description: Optional. URL to post a reply message to

credentials.description: Optional. Array of attached verifiable credentials

presentations.description: Optional. Array of attached verifiable presentations

handleMessage.description: Parses and optionally saves a message
